tagline: Can this device help you find aliens as well?
body: Well leagaly I don't have any alien hunting certificats unlink my ghost hunting certificates, for which I have 7. But what I can tell you is that this image above was taken by a certified Ghost Finderâ„¢ user. So take it for what you will.

The reason that this may work is that many alien researchers belive that aliens very well may be us from the future. And just like how ghosts are us from the past and the Ghost Finder lets you comunicate with them. The Ghost Finder very well may let us talk to aliens becuase the aliens would be talking to their past, meaning that we are the ghosts to them.
